title: Shakespeare in plain English
intro: A Shakespeare festival in Oregon has commissioned 'translations' of his plays into plain English. Of course, the language of Shakespeare's plays can be difficult, but is it a good idea to change his plays into simple English? Listen to experts talking about Shakespeare and learn new vocabulary.
this_week_question: What was the first language that Shakespeare's plays were translated into?

vocab.desc: to pay writers for their work
